title: Vapor cloud from Exxon refinery in California triggers alarm
text:
Published By: Reuters - Environment - Today 
LOS ANGELES (Reuters) - The unexplained release of a large vapor cloud on Friday from an Exxon Mobil Corp refinery near Los Angeles prompted...
